Package estg.ipp.pt.tp02_conferencesystem.interfaces

Interface Conference

  • public interface Conference

    Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
    Politécnico do Porto (PP)

    Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
    Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
    Paradigmas de Programação (PP)

    2021 / 2022

    Contract representing a Conference behaviour

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Getter for name
        Returns:
        The name of the Conference

      • getField

        java.lang.String getField()
        Getter for field
        Returns:
        The conference field (e.g. informatic, economy)

      • getState

        ConferenceState getState()
        Getter for conference state
        Returns:
        The Conference state

      • changeState

        void changeState()
        Changes the conference state. A specific flow should be preserved:on editing - in progress - finished.

      • getYear

        int getYear()
        Getter for conference year (each conference refers to a specific year). The year should be greater or equal than the current year
        Returns:
        The year of the Conference

      • addSession

        boolean addSession​(Session session)
            throws ConferenceException
        Adds a new session to the Conference Sessions can only be added to the conference while the conference state is: on editing
        Parameters:
        session - instance to be inserted
        Returns:
        1. true if the session was inserted
        2. false if the session already exists
        Throws:
        ConferenceException -
        1. if the @param session is null
        2. if the session room is already occupied, considering sessions start date and their duration
        3. if any participant is already presenting in another session at the same interval date/time
        4. if any presentation of this session is already into another session
        5. if the conference state is not on editing
        *

      • removeSession

        void removeSession​(int id)
            throws ConferenceException
        Removes the session in the conference
        Parameters:
        id - session identifier
        Throws:
        ConferenceException -
        1. if session id does not exists
        2. if the conference state is not on editing

      • getSession

        Session getSession​(int id)
            throws ConferenceException
        Return a existing session from a @param id
        Parameters:
        id - session id
        Returns:
        existing session from a id
        Throws:
        ConferenceException -
        1. if session id does not exists

      • getSessions

        Session[] getSessions()
        Return a copy of the existing sessions
        Returns:
        a copy of the existing sessions

      • checkIn

        void checkIn​(Participant participant)
      throws ConferenceException
        Checks in a new participant to the conference. Participants can only be associated (check in) if conference state is in progress
        Parameters:
        participant - associated participant
        Throws:
        ConferenceException -
        1. if the participant is null
        2. if the participant already checked in
        3. the conference state is not in progress

      • getParticipant

        Participant getParticipant​(int id)
                    throws ConferenceException
        Return an existing participant from a @param id
        Parameters:
        id - identifying the participant id
        Returns:
        a copy of an existing participant from a
        Throws:
        ConferenceException - if the participant does not exists

      • getParticipants

        Participant[] getParticipants()
        Return a copy of the existing participants
        Returns:
        a copy of the existing participants

      • getSpeakerParticipants

        Participant[] getSpeakerParticipants()
        Return a copy of existing speakers (without duplicates), i.e. have a presentation on the conference
        Returns:
        a list of all speakers

      • getRoomSessions

        Session[] getRoomSessions​(int roomId,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime startDate,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime endDate)
                   throws ConferenceException
        Return the existing session from a room id considering a datetime interval
        Parameters:
        roomId - identifying the room id
        startDate - start date
        endDate - end date
        Returns:
        sessions from the room
        Throws:
        ConferenceException -
        1. if the room id does not exists
        2. If the time interval is invalid
        3. the conference state is not in progress

      • getRooms

        Room[] getRooms()
        Return a copy of the existing rooms allocated to the sessions (without duplicates)
        Returns:
        a copy of the existing room allocated to the sessions

      • generateSpeakerCertificates

        void generateSpeakerCertificates​(java.lang.String filepath)
                          throws ConferenceException
        Generate the certificates for the speakers that have performed presentations The certificates can only be generated only when conference is finished
        Parameters:
        filepath - path to folder. The file name must be the participant identification (id) plus the presentation id
        Information should be saved in a JSON file and should include:
        1. participant name
        2. conference name
        3. year
        4. Presentation title
        5. Presentation date
        Throws:
        ConferenceException - if the conference is not finished

      • generateParticipantCertificates

        void generateParticipantCertificates​(java.lang.String filepath)
                              throws ConferenceException
        Generate the certificates for all participants (including speakers) The certificates can only be generated only when conference is finished
        Parameters:
        filepath - path to folder. The file name must be the participant identification (id)
        Information should be saved in a
        1. participant name
        2. conference name
        3. year
        Throws:
        ConferenceException - if the conference is not finished

      • getSchedule

        java.lang.String getSchedule()
        Return a string with the schedule of the conference. The sessions/presentations should be presented ordered.
        Returns:
        a string with the schedule of the conference. The sessions/presentations should be presented ordered.

      • getNumberOfParticipantsBySession

        Statistics[] getNumberOfParticipantsBySession()
        Generates the list of Statistics with number of participants by session
        Returns:
        list of Statistics with number of participants by session

        Returns:
        list of Statistics with number of sessions by room
